ygData.subject: Re: The Fun Begins!
ygData.msgSnippet: Tavatron held firmly to the base of Dinobot s neck as he took off, running deeper into the forest. She made sure to keep her hold on him light enough so as not

Subject: Re: The Fun Begins!
Date: Wed, 02 Aug 2000 20:39:00 EDT
Mime-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed
From: "FIRE FOX" <firefox_y2k@...>

Tavatron held firmly to the base of Dinobot's neck as he took off, running 
deeper into the forest. She made sure to keep her hold on him light enough 
so as not to hurt or startle him. This was all one big game to him, a game 
he had a very good chance of winning as long as the alliance didn't corner 
them. The sound of explosions and gun fire fading into the background as 
Tavatron began to survey her surroundings. The area was entirely new to her, 
and it was always good to learn more about one's surroundings. She would 
have to return under less threatenting circumstances in order to properly 
explore it.

Suddenly the sound of snapping and groaning reached her ears as she 
simultaneously swiveled her ears and turned her head in the direction of the 
sound. A tree had begun to fall, but luckily it wasn't a threat to them. 
With a sigh of relief Tavatron continued to gaze forward, trying her best to 
keep track of everything that lay before them. She stole a quick glance at 
Dinobot, a look was in his optics she had never seen before. He had 
something planned, of that she was sure.

Tavatron's ears swiveled back as Pyro's resounding scream reached her ears. 
The sound sent a slight shudder down her spine. Tavatron quickly dismissed 
the feeling as overworked nerves, not bothering to look behind her to see if 
they were still being pursued. Tavatron shook her head, doing her best to 
dispell the many twigs and leaves stuck in her fur. However, she only 
succeeded in entangling them even more, much to the wolf 'bot's annoyance.

Tavatron cried out in surprise as Breakdown's grenade exploded behind them, 
the dirt that hit her only adding to her already mussed and tangled fur. The 
forest seemd to grow even denser as Dinobot increased his pace, causing her 
to slightly tighten her grip, just so she wouldn't fall off.

Tavatron shut her optics as small pieces of a once great root flew up before 
her. Dinobot was having a little too much fun with this, not to mention her 
fur couldn't take much more badgering! When Dinobot looked at her his 
expression was anything but his usually emotionless stare. He was grinning, 
wickedly at that. Tavatron was about to say something when suddenly another 
spray of woodchips smacked her in the face. Tavatron shook her head and 
snarled softly. It was going to take hours to get her fur cleaned! Not to 
mention untangled! She had never really been one to worry about appearences, 
but even a girl such as herself had to have some sort of standard. She just 
happened to draw the line at near impossible knots in her fur!

"What are you going to do--"

Tavatron's sentence was cut off as Dinobot began his acrobatic jump from one 
tree to the next. Tavatron wrapped her arms about the base of his neck, her 
small frame pressed closely against his. She refused to look below, knowing 
as soon as she did so she'd probably fall. For the first few leaps Tavatron 
remained in this position, barely breathing due to shock and partially due 
to fear of falling. However, after a while she became used to the 
criss-cross action, and assured herself that Dinobot would not let her fall.

She cautiously loosened her grip slightly, and raised her head so it was 
even with his. This was actually kind of... fun. She hated to admit it, but 
this chase was the most exciting to happen to her in quite a while. Tavatron 
opened her mouth in atoothy wolf grin as she began to laugh softly. This was 
fun!
